inclusion.criterion: HIV-uninfected and infected women (without current AIDS-defining illness)
inclusion.label: met

inclusion.criterion: Biopsy-proven LSIL disease or recently treated HSIL disease
inclusion.label: met

inclusion.criterion: Adherence to combined anti-retrovirals (cART) if HIV infected
inclusion.label: met

inclusion.criterion: On continuous antiretrovirals with a cluster of differentiation 4 (CD4) count >200 cells/ml with sustained undetectable viral load for at least 3 months (only for HIV-positive participants)
inclusion.label: not_met

inclusion.criterion: On reliable birth control: combined oral contraceptive pills (OCP), long-acting reversible contraception (LARC), bilateral tubal ligation (BTL) or Depo-Provera (birth control shot)
inclusion.label: met

inclusion.criterion: Willing to conform to the study requirements
inclusion.label: met

inclusion.criterion: No risk factors for HSIL or microinvasive disease (no colposcopic features of microinvasion, adequate colposcopy and negative endocervical curettage)
inclusion.label: met

inclusion.criterion: For women with HSIL only, LEEP completed within 6 weeks preceding initial encounter with study staff and adequate wound healing
inclusion.label: not_met

exclusion.criterion: Untreated HSIL or invasive features on colposcopy and the biopsy specimen
exclusion.label: triggers

exclusion.criterion: Not adherent to anti-retroviral therapy (cART) (HIV infected participants)
exclusion.label: triggers

exclusion.criterion: CD4 count =<200 cells/ml and detectable viral load within the last 3 months (only for HIV-positive participants)
exclusion.label: triggers

exclusion.criterion: Patient with irregular cycles (more than once a month)
exclusion.label: not_met

exclusion.criterion: Prior diagnosis of cervical cancer, treated or untreated
exclusion.label: triggers

notes: A 54-year-old woman with abnormal cervical squamous intraepithelial/glandular lesion and HPV 16 positivity. She smokes and drinks alcohol frequently.
